item.description:
Create some culinary magic of your own by learning the time-honored secrets of Italian cooking through a cooking demo at la romagnoli & SON. Chef/proprietor Anna Romagnoli will demonstrate the preparation of several complimentary courses of one authentic Italian meal that reflects seasonal cuisine. Keeping classes to small groups allows for dialogue, questions and answers.

Once the food has been prepared, you’ll sit down and eat it together, Italian-style.

Buy With Me is having a deal on this Italian Chef Demo. This demo is normally $75, but from now through Sunday you can buy the deal for $35 at this web site:
http://www.buywithme....

Classes run in the evenings from 7:30-9pm. There are several dates now through March. Since the classes change each week, you can buy as many vouchers as you’d like and learn something new each time!

You need to buy a ticket in order to attend the event. If you don't buy a ticket this week through Buy With Me, you can still attend the event and pay the full price of $75.00.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Italian Chef Demo and Dinner
